name: CusMeDroid

shortcuts.name: CusMeDroid
shortcuts.description: Cusmedroid is an android studio application development project name. the name was created by iyortml alias suryo dwijayanto. Initially cusmedroid was a custom rom project on android, at that time in 2014 - 2015 cusmedroid was still looking for identity, until now in 2022 - then cusmedroid will be the unique name of me who doesn’t have a team.
